resources.string: By continue you agree to our\nTerms & Privacy Policy
• 2 slices of your favorite bread (sourdough or brioche works great)\n• 2 slices of cheese (cheddar, Swiss, or a mix)\n• 2 tablespoons of butter, softened.

1. Prepare the bread: Spread a thin, even layer of softened butter on one side of each bread slice.

2. Assemble the sandwich: Place one slice of bread, butter-side down, in a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat. Lay the cheese slices on the bread. Place the second slice of bread on top, with the buttered side facing up.

3. Grill to perfection: Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the bottom is golden brown and the cheese begins to melt.

4. Flip and finish: Carefully flip the sandwich and cook the other side for another 2-3 minutes until it is also golden brown and the cheese is fully melted and gooey.

5. Serve: Remove from the skillet, slice in half diagonally, and serve immediately.
